summary: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter by a man who claims that the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.
cast: John Goodman|Mary Elizabeth Winstead|John Gallagher Jr.|Douglas M. Griffin|Suzanne Cryer|Bradley Cooper|Sumalee Montano|Frank Mottek|Kayla Bechor
title: Calle Cloverfield 10
